[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ max_width_last_edited=”on|phone”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”Printed Circuit Boards Assembly” text_orientation=”center” button_one_text=”Find out more” button_one_url=”https://basset.com.my/#learn-more” content_max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.19″ title_font=”||||||||” title_text_align=”center” content_font=”||||||||” background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.5)” background_image=”https://basset.com.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/image-1.png” background_blend=”overlay”]

Precision. Reliability. A decade of proven track record in Malaysia.

Basset is your one-stop solution for all circuit board services, with expertise in PCB Assembly and Surface Mount Technology.

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22.3″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.22.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.19″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19″ max_width_phone=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center”]

About Basset

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”80%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center”]

Basset Sdn Bhd was established more than a decade ago as a manufacturing facility for a wide range of made-to-order printed circuit boards. With a strong reputation for precision, reliability and engineering expertise in this field, Basset has established itself as a one-stop destination for printed circuit boards. In keeping with its commitment to professional manufacturing practices, Basset obtained the ISO 9001:2000 certification in 2001.

Basset has the facilities, the capability and the technical expertise for the full range of PCBs.

Surface Mount Technology (SMT)
Plastic Injection Moulding
Pad printing up to four colors

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_class=”center-button-mobile center-text-mobile” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_color=”#232c26″][et_pb_row module_id=”learn-more” _builder_version=”3.22.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.19″][et_pb_image src=”https://basset.com.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/image-2.png” _builder_version=”3.19″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.19″][et_pb_text module_class=”center-text-mobile” _builder_version=”3.19″ text_font=”||||||||” link_font=”||||||||” background_layout=”dark”]

Surface Mount Technology

PCBA Assembly

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19″ text_font=”||||||||” background_layout=”dark”]

With a decade of experience in producing a wide range of printed circuit boards, Basset can fulfill your PCBA needs. Our facilities abide by professional manufacturing practices and rigorous testing procedures to ensure the quality of all our final products.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://basset.com.my/pcb-assembly/” button_text=”Our PCBA services” _builder_version=”3.19″ background_layout=”dark”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_class=”center-button-mobile center-text-mobile” _builder_version=”3.22.3″][et_pb_row module_class=”reverse-columns-mobile” _builder_version=”3.22.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.19″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19″ text_font=”||||||||” link_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||”]

MaxTag

Toll and parking convenience

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19″]

MaxTag makes your journeys through toll plazas a breeze. It is compatible with all SmartTAG lanes and allows you to easily check your Touch ‘n Go balance. 

With a new generation microprocessor and an enhanced LCD display, MaxTag performs reliably for your toll and parking convenience.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://maxtag.com.my/” button_text=”Buy online” _builder_version=”3.22.7″ background_layout=”dark”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.19″][et_pb_image src=”https://basset.com.my/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/MaxTag-Top.jpg” _builder_version=”3.22.7″ custom_margin=”||30px”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.19″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.5)” background_image=”https://basset.com.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/image-1.png” background_blend=”overlay” global_module=”88″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.22.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.19″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19″ text_font=”||||||||” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark”]

Get In Touch

Find out how we can fulfill your printed circuit board needs. Contact us today!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://basset.com.my/contact-us/” button_text=”Contact Us” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”3.19″ background_layout=”dark”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
